resources.string: The App to listen to old and New Great Artists!
Click on the image below to start!
In this layout the used can select which band they want to listen to giving a click on each of the previous bands
In this layout you can play the artist song and also buy the song. Also see a photo of the artist and you will have the option to return to the list of artist.
In this layout the purchase of the song is being confirmed, once you click on purchase song.
In this layout you can pick from a list of artist in order to see their history and music

I researched the following page and i will be using Android Pay API for the payment method,this API will enable users to only enter their credit card once in the android pay app.By this users will only put their information once, and will use their payments in every app thay supports Android Pay. https://developers.google.com/android-pay/tutorial
